post.body: i like the Conversations thing. everything else kontact already has. finally, there's competition in the groupware space! ;)
wooo! go get 'em! =)
it only takes half the resources on mine: compiling takes only two cores on my laptop. *cough* ;)
moved from OpenSuse 11.0 to OpenSuse 11.1; things look nicer, seem faster ... but the webcam is a loss: uvcvideo has issues.
weee! kde 4.2 beta 2 (aka 4.1.85) is out! huzzah! and i haven't had a kontact crash in a week! woo!
twitter meme time! best music in a TV series! i call: Life. tonights music was obscure, amazing and fit the storyline perfectly. your turn!
in -30 weather, snow squeaks (yes, squeaks) oddly when you walk on it. *squeak* *squeak* bizarre.
omg. what is it with our community and its penchance for performing questionable music on video? http://tinyurl.com/3sjqjx
thought the Qt4 dance was slightly uncomfortable but somehow cool? you ain't see nothing yet! http://www.vimeo.com/2551000 wooooooO!
KDE4 one of 2008's "Top Moments in Linux" http://lunduke.com/?p=50
-30C outside, ice on the inside of the windows (old house), but plasma is HOT HOT HOT today. tons of commits =)
Snow. Lots and lots of snow. Roads are horrible, passed several stuck cars and watched an accident take place next to me at a stop light.
Animated wallpapers in Plasmas. Thank you E17! http://tinyurl.com/6c8we7
today gas for my car cost me 0.73 CAD, or ~0.45 Euro, per litre. cross country road trips are affordable again! ;)
Amarok 2.0!!! http://amarok.kde.org/en/releases/2.0 .. congrats to all involved.
obviously people aren't reporting bugs fast enough anymore ;)
holy cramoley ... 497 bugs opened, 916 bugs closed in the last 7 days .. i remember when closing >10 bugs would land you in the top 5 ...
wow, the code in Twitter::showTweets is .. scary. one would think there's a better way to do what it's doing. :P
I should set up a debugging account on Twitter so I'm not spamming this one with silly useless updates. ;)
Debugging the twitter DataEngine ... must get Plasma bugs under 200! ;)
still snowy and cold outside, and its impeding my desire to do paperwork. or the dishes. ;)
working with chani on the ecmascript bindings. the ones in kdebase are in a sad, sad state but must actually be usable for 4.2.0.
